name: Night Fly
description: Night Fly - 2D game that will give you a chance to test your nerves for strength in artful locations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
